snippet: A suicide bomber attacked a funeral attended by an anti-Taliban politician in northwest Pakistan on Sunday, killing at least 15 mourners, officials said.
abstract: Suicide bomber attacks a funeral attended by anti-Taliban politician Khush Dil Khan in northwest Pakistan, killing at least 15 mourners; Khan escapes unhurt.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber attacked a funeral attended by an anti-Taliban politician in northwest Pakistan on Sunday, killing at least 15 mourners, officials said.
